UltraVPS.eu is a brand of Bradler & Krantz GmbH Co. KG. Since 1999 we offer high quality hosting services to our customers and are amongst the most established providers in Europe. With our product series UltraVPS.eu we offer powerful and reliable virtual servers for low prices.

**All Virtual Servers include:**

* Reliable and secure KVM virtualization
* First-class Supermicro hardware with Registered ECC RAM, redundant coolers, redundant PSUs etc
* ZFS enterprise-grade SAS and SSD storage
* Easy-to-use control panel (in-house developed)
* 1 IPv4 address and 10 native IPv6 addresses
